titleSection.name: VersionOne Java Object Model
titleSection.shortDescription: A strongly-typed object model library on top of the VersionOne API.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Java Object Model has been deprecated as of the Spring 2015 release of VersionOne and is no longer supported by VersionOne. It is now open-sourced and supported by the development community. Please see [VersionOne Java SDK](http://appcatalog.versionone.com/VersionOne.SDK.Java.APIClient) for an alternative API library.

linksSection.title: SDK.Java Object Model on Maven Central
GitHub Project for Source Code and Issues

updates.releaseNotes:
* Fixed: Epic can have Tests as children. 
 * Fixed: Epic.Risk is a Number, not a List Value.
Fixed: Project.GetChildProjects filtered with attribute no longer available in 12.0
Changed: Epics changed from substate of Story to a first class asset in meta.
Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy.

* Added: The .NET and Java SDK Object Model contains objects for Regression Testing assets (Regression TestSet, Environment, Regression Test, Regression Plan, Regression Suite). 
 * Fixed: FilterTerm.Exists doesnâ€™t work when filtering for empty relationships. 
 * Fixed: SDK canDelete method returns true on Closed Assets. 
 * Fixed: SDK tries to retrieve Actual.AssetState which is an invalid attribute. 
 * Fixed: SDK honors local settings for numbers. 
 * Fixed: SDK does not cache connections

* ObjectModel library supports creating assets that have required fields defined in VersionOne 
 * Added a RequiredFieldValidator class to APIClient library. This class can be used to validate an asset before saving.
Added ability to set cookies in HTTP request

* Added the ability to send custom headers to the VersionOne server 
 * Fixed defect that prevented putting OIDs in a dictionary 
 * Fixed defect that prevented requesting multiple asset types in one server call 
 * Fixed defect that prevented adding a new item to multivalue list 
 * Fixed defect that prevented setting string values to an empty string or null. 
 * Fixed defect in Service.save methog that resulted in exceptions when there was no server connectionFixed defect in Service.save methog that resulted in exceptions when there was no server connection 
 * Fixed defect with BaseAsset.isActive and BaseAsset.isClosed that resulted in invalid values when asset was cached 
 * Removed Entity.GetMyLastChangeDate and Entity.GetMyLastChangeComment from ObjectModel.

* Added ability to filter on Create Date and Change Date 
 * Added ability to filter on Effort Date 
 * Fixed defect sending and receiving non-ascii characters 
 * Fixed defect that prevented sending LastAccessed information to server 
 * Fixed defect that resulted in NULL value being returned when getting effort by ID

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
